Australia sweats through heatwave, bushfire risk rated 'extreme'Large swaths of Australia on Sunday sweltered through a heatwave as authorities warned of elevated bushfire risk in an already high-risk fire season during an El Nino weather pattern. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 01:28:34 GMT JBUSJC4WIROHZOBNSMR4EUBDCY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-sweats-through-heatwave-bushfire-risk-lated-extreme-2024-02-04/Reuters可持续发展气候与能源
US, Britain wage strikes against Iran-linked Houthis in YemenThe strikes hit buried weapons storage facilities, missile systems, launchers and other capabilities the Houthis have used to attack Red Sea shipping, the Pentagon said. It was the latest sign of spreading conflict in the Middle East. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 21:36:41 GMT XQCLK7TKQRP4RGPJ565CY4IR4A https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-carrying-out-new-strikes-yemen-us-officials-say-2024-02-03/Phil Stewart, Idrees Ali世界中东
US conducts strikes in self-defense against six Houthi anti-ship cruise missilesThe U.S. Central Command said on Saturday that U.S. forces conducted strikes in self-defense against six Houthi anti-ship cruise missiles prepared to launch against ships in the Red Sea. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 20:27:05 GMT 24WZH3FODBLDRP2SEJLTPONXLA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-conducts-strikes-self-defense-against-six-houthi-anti-ship-cruise-missiles-2024-02-03/Reuters世界中东
US House panel recommends $17.6 billion in military aid for IsraelLegislation providing $17.6 billion in new military assistance to Israel as it wages war against Hamas was unveiled on Saturday in the U.S. House of Representatives. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 20:07:35 GMT ZLRR6D6SIRONJG5N7D5LOC6U3I https://www.reuters.com/world/us-house-panel-recommends-176-billion-military-aid-israel-2024-02-03/Richard Cowan世界
Pope condemns anti-Judaism, anti-Semitism amid new wave of attacks against JewsPope Francis condemned all forms of anti-Judaism and anti-Semitism, labelling them as a "sin against God", after noticing an increase in attacks against Jews around the world. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 17:19:08 GMT 2E3DQ5OD7FOHNGBKKSS72FHPPU https://www.reuters.com/world/pope-condemns-anti-judaism-anti-semitism-amid-new-wave-attacks-against-jews-2024-02-03/Reuters世界
Forest fires kill 51 in Chile, menace urban areasForest fires raging in central Chile have killed at least 51 people and the death toll is likely to keep climbing, authorities said on Saturday, as emergency services battled to snuff out flames threatening urban areas. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 17:18:31 GMT U5Y33TUG55PUTDVB73N6ECUEBU https://www.reuters.com/business/environment/raging-forest-fires-kill-least-19-chile-toll-expected-rise-2024-02-03/Reuters可持续发展气候与能源
Around 200,000 gather across Germany in latest protests against far-rightAround 200,000 people took to the streets in Germany on Saturday, most of them in the capital Berlin, as nationwide protests against the far-right Alternative for Germany (AfD) party entered their fourth week. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 14:01:38 GMT OUBSYM4PBBOERJYOMP4NQR6PWM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/least-120000-gather-berlin-latest-round-protests-against-far-right-2024-02-03/Andreas Rinke, Christoph Steitz世界欧洲
Journalists briefly detained in Moscow at protest by soldiers' wivesAround 20 journalists were detained by police in central Moscow for several hours on Saturday at a rally of Russian soldiers' wives calling for their men to be returned from the front in Ukraine, a Reuters witness said. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 13:40:34 GMT JENHLKNI7JPPPOKWEZXTGXW7EU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/dozens-detained-moscow-rally- Russian-soldiers-wives-rights-group-2024-02-03/Reuters世界欧洲
U.S. launches strikes in Iraq, Syria, nearly 40 reported killedThe strikes, which included the use of long-range B-1 bombers flown from the United States, were the first in a U.S. response to an attack in Jordan last weekend by Iran-backed militants that killed three U.S. troops. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 11:48:14 GMT 4ETDYVPK2FPAHKV7G5NZ6YE6CI https://www.reuters.com/world/us-launches-retaliatory-strikes-iraq-syria-nearly-40-reported-killed-2024-02-03/Phil Stewart, Idrees Ali, Timour Azhari世界
India to replace troops in Maldives with civilians by MayIndia will remove its troops in the Maldives by May, the Maldivian Foreign Ministry said on Saturday, as the two countries seek agreement on a pullout that has strained ties. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 11:40:01 GMT ONKQWJCEP5MKTC4OVTZLHLKVCY https://www.reuters.com/world/india-replace-troops-maldives-with-civilians-by-may-2024-02-03/Krishn Kaushik, Mohamed Junayd世界
Ukraine hits Russia's Volgograd oil refinery in latest drone attack, source saysLocal authorities in Russia said a fire had been extinguished at the Volgograd refinery following a drone attack. Lukoil, which owns the refinery, said the plant was working as normal. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 11:35:57 GMT RZRFOJIIKZLAHDI6J2GAZARFZQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-sbu-hits-Russias-volgograd-oil-refinery-drone-attack-source-2024-02-03/Tom Balmforth世界欧洲
